about_the_game:
Radioactivity – Team up with friends as Liquidators! Avoid mutated horrors. Clean up radioactive wasteland. Survive. Have fun.

You and your team are Liquidators. You work on behalf of the public and the state, cleaning up the radioactive wasteland left by a devastating radioactive impact. Your goal is not only to earn but to survive and overcome the threats lurking in this dangerous world.

  • With your friends help your state to clean up the radioactive sectors of the zone
  • Procedurally generated locations promise a unique adventure with each new game entry.
  • Survival: Avoid being eaten by mutants, improve your equipment to reach more dangerous areas, and outsmart the unforgiving environment.
  • Mutants: Face unique nightmarish creatures twisted by radiation – fight for your life or become their prey.
  • World hazards: Nights are full of threats, but also valuable items. Mutants, radiation, and anomalies make every step risky.
  • Team up: Utilize proximity-based voice communication to strategize with your team in real time. Whether you're planning your next move, sharing resources, or warning of dangers, clear and direct communication is key to survival.

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game contains graphic violence, psychological horror elements, and jumpscares, including death, dismemberment and decapitation. Characters can abuse fictional medical drugs with potentially harmful consequences.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-13600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060, 3 GB
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-14700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 TI, 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: Radioactivity is a co-op survival horror. You and your friends work as Liquidators who help their state clean up post-apocalyptic radioactive wasteland. Venture to various radioactive sectors, find loot, face mutants, clean up the zone and survive together.
